reviews.review: Current patch ruined the game. I'm all for changing the meta. But they made the game waaaay too killer sided. Killers are camping and tunneling more than ever. Actually quitting until they fix this.
Fun game kind of akin to friday the 13th

Game is trash. Lobby of 5 players, and devs consistently make 4 out of the 5 players miserable and essentially unplayable. Newest update was the biggest joke of all, now new players really can't enter this game and have a good time.

So basically, play this game if you enjoy pain. Me and my friends have suffered through 69 brutal hours of being stalked, blinked on, shot, slashed, hatchet slain, puked on, mauled, chainsawed, and straight up abandoned by the randoms in our lobbies. Yet, we somehow get on multiple nights a week. I have enjoyed running straight through killers and learning little to no skills while being a survivor. Someone bought me this game and to them i say screw you but also thank you so much for allowing me to have something that makes me SO MAD and SO HAPPY :D
Lo mejor de este juego es cuando tenes que ir con el killer a bailar al jack
the best game by far in the horror style.
fun game. one day meta is survivor always win next day meta killer always win next day people d/c next day people troll. very fun
great game, remains fun and requires skill. keeps you on your toes and suspenseful
la nueva actualizacion es un bulling contra los supervivientes
muito ruim, porco, mas √© dahora compra ai mano

Fun game with friends, has its fun side and salty side. I think a group of friends who buy this game will have fun for awhile. Mostly about looping around obstacles to try and avoid the killer. Honestly can be really competitive and fun. Definetly ignore the community, they will just lead you down a bad path! The devs have no idea what they are doing with the game though.

Not sure how the developers got so out of touch with the survivor playerbase, but introducing a patch where I have to spend significantly more time mindlessly working on generators is such a turn off. I get the whole concept of making a bunch of changes and balance updates to give your players the perception you're invested in your game. However, it just feels cheap and lazy. I would have liked to see more objectives for survivors to complete to balance game duration as opposed to making me sit on the same generator for over a minute and half. Don't recommend this game to solo players during this patch (6.1)

BEST STRATEGY AND HORROR GAME OF ALL TIME! I have had this game for a while now and I first played it on my xbox on gamepass but then i switched to computer with the stranger things pack including the game This game is my most played game on steam. It's so fun and every match always is so different witch makes it fun. This game is even more fun with friends as you can do custom matches or pubs. PLEASE BUY THIS GAME IT'S WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!

This new update sucks for players like me. That is for players don't play this game solely play this game. 
People who had everyone at prestige 3 before update wont have a problem, because they will have everything unlocked.
But for players like me, who use maybe three killers and two survivors it fucking sucks. It was already hard to come back and play this game, now they just made it an easy decision.
this game is like communism: it's great.

The devs care about this game an awful lot, and it's a shame that it goes so unnoticed by the community. Be prepared for a whole lot of toxicity, but if you can push through that, this game is incredibly fun.
Muy bueno solo deber√≠an optimizarlo un poco mejor.
i unironically hate this game and am always less happy after playing than i was before. do not let it suck u in i beg.

Been playing since 2018, and at first it was fun, but nowadays its borderline impossible and unfun to play as killer, every match ends up with you loose and survivor players being very toxic and they would always teabag you at the exits, I dont understand why, maybe because they are all immature and never play as killer and see how it feels like.
its a very fun game, some people are assholes most are pretty cool. Dont be an asshole

I can forgive this game's wonky meta, and honest to god toxicity. It has to be said, however, that this has been the only game to date that has made me feel dejected and sad. Dead by Daylight has issues I can forgive; you can try to control toxicity, but it's a fools errand. It would be nice, however, if they tried. 

My thoughts can be broken into two main issues. Feigning balance where asymmetry is designed is a slight of hand that BHVR never should have engaged in. Either the game is asymmetrical and one side is meant to win most often, or you try to keep the win rates 50/50. Playing with the meta to bandage poor game design, with a weak cry that it's working as intended, is not acceptable. That brings me to my main issue with Dead By Daylight: nothing works as intended. The spaghetti code becomes ever clearer with each update as small unrelated change bursts forth a game breaking bug like a Xenomorph feeding on the corpse of its 2016 code. 

I can forgive a toxic player base and asymmetry. I cannot forgive the game breaking bugs which can happen with every update. Working on your skills in this game means nought with rubber banding, crashes, and non-existent anti-cheat which are actively killing this game.
I have played evenly on killer and survivor on PS4. I ground my way to every perk and play-style I could get and at one point I loved it. Faced with that same climb again on this platform, with the game in this state, I cannot think of a better way to disgrace the good name that Dead by Daylight had once built up for itself. Dead by Daylight is proof that even passion and love is not enough to carry a game like this. You need skill.

It saddens me deeply that a project that has so painstakingly and lovingly worked on horror as a genre can fall so flat with poor coding.

My hope is that this project can be built from the ground up by a studio which can handle an online multiplayer game of this scale but that it doesn't lose the passion, which BHVR piss on with every patch.

I came back because I heard the game was receiving some much-needed balance and I'm not disappointed at all. Bonus points for many more killers. As a killer-only player things were getting pretty stale, but now you can literally play for hours without using the same one. And if you don't want to buy them all it takes is 30 levels worth of progression bonuses if you're ftp.
its great and well made please play
Recent update makes the game garbage for survivors.  The developer's ineptitude to balance and fix things is in full showcase now.

I've never had a game invoke such mass amounts of frustration as this one. Something about DBD will inevitably make you very upset no matter how hard you try not to be affected. I feel like it's just built into the gameplay to make the losing side have the least amount of fun possible. I keep coming back though because the grind is so extensive that it keeps you from leaving after you've committed so much time to the game. It can be fun sometimes, especially with SWFs, but most of the time I feel my soul draining away as I play. Don't get trapped by this evil, evil game.

Gave me like 30 mental health issues

Usually I'm not much for online multiplayer due to a lack of teamwork in my experience, but this game hits different. You have incentives to help the other players around you when your playing survivor, loadouts that you can make work in a number of different ways and strategies and youre in a setting that truly got jumps out of me when getting attacked. There is a bit of a learning curve, especially when youre still learning the killers different powers and method, but the first game I won was a huge pat on the shoulder and reassured me that my purchase was a good one.
nerfing dead hard was a bad idea

mmm much kill, no survive. good game to play with friends.
Dieses wahnsinnig umfangreiche Spiel kann total gut sein.

Game is fucking trash. Get all the campers in the world for killers. every killers i come across are literally camping and no sportsmanship at all. absolute trash. if they're not going to do anything about this game's eco system then just delete the game and not make anymore of this shit. i'm sick and tired of killers absolutely camping their asses off looking at me waiting for me to die. and dont get me started on hackers who uses map hacks. you know who you are.
good game it's been out for a while, the only thing that i wish is that they come out with a new dead by daylight game and allow increased fps.
Blow up your teammates' generators and hide in closet for most of the game, you too can become an useless survivor and get some of that sweet hatemail!

I dont have too much time on this game but it is fun. I have all my time put in as killer and its a good experience. The grind to iri can be difficult and annoying at times (if you do go for it) but fun.
Beware of SWF Groups. otherwise this game is amazingly fun :> i do hope they add more and more
terribly toxic at times but getting a good few buddies and just vibin is so much fun. it also feels nice whenever a plan you hope works ends up working.
